overview_of_class: In this course we will engage with the works (poetry, autobiographies, novels, short stories etc.) of women writers from India and Pakistan. We will explore how women writers - from the 16th century devotional poet Mirabai to modern and contemporary feminist authors writing in English, Hindi, Urdu, Malayalam, Telugu, and Bengali - continue to articulate and re-imagine the female experience in South Asian societies, offering fierce challenges to the foundations of patriarchy.
name: Gender, Sexuality, and Literature
subject: GNDR_ST
